events.title: Tunisia vs Uganda - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
events.desc: This will be the third encounter between Tunisia and Uganda at AFCON, but also their first meeting in the tournament for 47 years. Tunisia won both of their previous matches, scoring six goals and conceding only one. This is Tunisia’s 22nd participation in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, and their 17th in a row, the latter being a record in the history of the tournament. Their only AFCON title dates back to 2004, as hosts; since then, they’ve progressed past the quarter-finals only once, in 2019, losing in the third-place match.

A thrilling battle unfolds, with Sinner’s aggressive play clashing against Zverev’s powerful serves and groundstrokes.
